verses.verse: <S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G321>led<s%> up by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> into the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> to be <S%G3985>tempted<s%> by the <S%G1228>devil.<s%>
And after He had <S%G3522>fasted<s%> <S%G5065>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> and <S%G5065>forty<s%> <S%G3571>nights,<s%> He <S%G5306>then<s%> became <S%G3983>hungry.<s%>

And the <S%G3985>tempter<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G1487>"If<s%> You are the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3004>command<s%> that <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>"

But He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "It is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G444>'Man<s%> shall not <S%G2198>live<s%> on <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G3441>alone,<s%> but on <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> that <S%G1607>proceeds<s%> out of the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>'"
<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G3880>took<s%> Him into the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4172>city;<s%> and he had Him <S%G2476>stand<s%> on the <S%G4419>pinnacle<s%> of the <S%G2413>temple,<s%>

and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G1487>"If<s%> You are the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G906>throw<s%> <S%G4572>Yourself<s%> <S%G2736>down;<s%> for it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> 'He will <S%G1781>give<s%> His <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1781>charge<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> You'; and 'On [their] <S%G5495>hands<s%> they will <S%G142>bear<s%> You up, <S%G3379>Lest<s%> You <S%G4350>strike<s%> Your <S%G4228>foot<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> a <S%G3037>stone.<s%>'"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to him, "On the <S%G3825>other<s%> <S%G3825>hand,<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> 'You shall not <S%G1598>put<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> your <S%G2316>God<s%> to the <S%G1598>test.<s%>'"

<S%G3825>Again,<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G3880>took<s%> Him to a <S%G3029>very<s%> <S%G5308>high<s%> <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> and <S%G1166>showed<s%> Him <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G932>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and their <S%G1391>glory;<s%>

and he <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G3956>"All<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> will I <S%G1325>give<s%> You, <S%G1437>if<s%> You <S%G4098>fall<s%> <S%G4098>down<s%> and <S%G4352>worship<s%> me."

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G5217>"Begone,<s%> <S%G4567>Satan!<s%> For it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> 'You shall <S%G4352>worship<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> your <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G3000>serve<s%> Him <S%G3441>only.<s%>'"
<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> Him; and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and [began] to <S%G1247>minister<s%> to Him.
<S%G1161>Now<s%> when He <S%G191>heard<s%> that <S%G2491>John<s%> had been <S%G3860>taken<s%> into <S%G3860>custody,<s%> He <S%G402>withdrew<s%> into <S%G1056>Galilee;<s%>

and <S%G2641>leaving<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth,<s%> He <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2730>settled<s%> in <S%G2746>Capernaum,<s%> which is by the <S%G3864>sea,<s%> in the <S%G3725>region<s%> of <S%G2194>Zebulun<s%> and <S%G3508>Naphtali.<s%>
[This was] to <S%G4137>fulfill<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> was <S%G3004>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

"The <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2194>Zebulun<s%> and the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G3508>Naphtali,<s%> By the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G4008>beyond<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan,<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> â€“

"The <S%G2992>people<s%> who were <S%G2521>sitting<s%> in <S%G4653>darkness<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5457>light,<s%> And to <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G2521>sitting<s%> in the <S%G5561>land<s%> and <S%G4639>shadow<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> Upon them a <S%G5457>light<s%> <S%G393>dawned.<s%>"

From that <S%G5119>time<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G2784>preach<s%> and <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3340>"Repent,<s%> for the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is at <S%G1448>hand.<s%>"

And <S%G4043>walking<s%> by the <S%G2281>Sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> He <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> who was <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> and <S%G406>Andrew<s%> his <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G906>casting<s%> a <S%G293>net<s%> into the <S%G2281>sea;<s%> for they were <S%G231>fishermen.<s%>
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G1205>"Follow<s%> <S%G3694><s%> Me, and I will <S%G4160>make<s%> you <S%G231>fishers<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>"
And they <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> the <S%G1350>nets,<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> Him.

And <S%G4260>going<s%> on from <S%G1564>there<s%> He <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> the [son] of <S%G2199>Zebedee,<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%> his <S%G80>brother,<s%> in the <S%G4143>boat<s%> with <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%> their <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G2675>mending<s%> their <S%G1350>nets;<s%> and He <S%G2564>called<s%> them.
And they <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> the <S%G4143>boat<s%> and their <S%G3962>father,<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> Him.

And [Jesus] was <S%G4013>going<s%> <S%G4013>about<s%> in <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> in their <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> and <S%G2784>proclaiming<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> and <S%G2323>healing<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3956>kind<s%> of <S%G3554>disease<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3956>kind<s%> of <S%G3119>sickness<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2992>people.<s%>

And the <S%G189>news<s%> about Him <S%G565>went<s%> out into <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G4947>Syria;<s%> and they <S%G4374>brought<s%> to Him <S%G3956>all<s%> who were <S%G2192>ill,<s%> <S%G2560><s%> <S%G4912>taken<s%> with <S%G4164>various<s%> <S%G3554>diseases<s%> and <S%G931>pains,<s%> <S%G1139>demoniacs,<s%> <S%G4583>epileptics,<s%> <S%G3885>paralytics;<s%> and He <S%G2323>healed<s%> them.

And <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> Him from <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> and <S%G1179>Decapolis<s%> and <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%G2453>Judea<s%> and [from] <S%G4008>beyond<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan.<s%>
